description: Detects use of redirection character ">" to redicrect information in commandline
author: frack113
false_positives: Internet Download Manager extensions use named pipes and redirection via CLI. Filter it out if you use it in your environment
name: Redirect Output in CommandLine
query: ((((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Cmd.Exe") OR (process.executable.text:*\\cmd.exe)) AND process.command_line.text:*>*) AND (NOT process.command_line.text:(*C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Internet\ Download\ Manager\\IDMMsgHost.exe* OR *chrome\-extension\:\/\/* OR *\\.\\pipe\\chrome.nativeMessaging*)))
